creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen Wang in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: frontal view of seated middle-aged woman wearing blue robe with undergarments with gold dragons; chest piece of gold with white chicken and multicolored clouds or smoke; beads of white, red and jade hang from shoulders; gold earrings with white and red beads
medium: Ink, colors and gold on paper
title: Portrait of a Ranking Official's Wife
